content: I insist that the gov cover 100% of my mental health costs because US politics has driven me crazy. I started out tonight as my usual lefty self, horrified by everything republican and shuddering in disgust at everything Trump. I was reading about the satanic Koch bros when I was sucked into a worm hole about an ultra spooky guy named Robert Mercer, and from there to a guy named Art Robinson who twisted my brain into a pretzel and gave me an identity crisis. For a while he had me thinking that there was a liberal plot to keep people under control by preventing development and progress. Now, my sense of reality is shot. There’s no solid ground underneath me anymore, and everything, left and right, is just a formless blur.
